price: 111 Quiconque se rend coupable d’un péché en subira seul les conséquences. Allah est Omniscient et infiniment Sage.
arabic: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waman yaksib ith'man fa-innamā yaksibuhu ʿalā nafsihi wakāna al-lahu ʿalīman ḥakīman
